name: Reference Rossland Range Backcountry Ski Map and Guide
categories: Rossland Range Backcountry Ski Map and Guide
description: With years of backcountry experience and local knowledge, CAA professionals, ACMG/UIFMG members, and GIS technicians have teamed together to create this guide for skiiers and snowboarders in the Rossland Range. Includes georeferenced route photographs, approach routes, avalanche terrain assessment scales and hut locations.
